definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Then it says, count all the valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 然后它说，考虑所有的价电子。

sentences.english: Our next step is thinking about valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 我们下一步要考虑的是价电子。

sentences.english: So let's think about methane using valence bond theory.
sentences.chinese: 让我们用价电子成键理论来看一看甲烷。

sentences.english: And, this outermost shell is termed the valence shell.
sentences.chinese: 这个最外层被称作价电子层。

sentences.english: So this is our valence electron configuration for b 2.
For our step two, what we need is number of valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 我们的第二步，需要知道价电子的个数。

sentences.english: So, what if we capture all of the valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果我们捕获了所有价电子又怎样呢。

sentences.english: This thing is not going to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 所以光能并不会对价电子能有影响。

sentences.english: How many valence electrons do we have left?
sentences.chinese: 我们还剩下多少个价电子？

sentences.english: +6=12 Oxygen has six valence electrons. Six plus six is 12.
Would you expect to see electron promotion for boron?
We actually need to think about those valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要考虑这些价电子。

sentences.english: Again, we're just talking about the valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，我们只讨论价电子。

sentences.english: It means cooperative sharing of valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着价电子的合作共享。

sentences.english: All right, well, oxygen has the highest valence electron energy.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，氧具有最高价电子平均能。

sentences.english: In other words, if the average energy of all the valence electrons.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，就是所有价电子的平均能量。
